candidates.name: Chris Te Whare
candidates.why_elect: I have lived around the Great Lake for the last 13 years (it's a great place to live, work and play) and have lived or taught in Turangi, Mangakino and I now live in Wairakei Village. All my work has been community based and I believe that I can contribute!
candidates.why_stand: I am running for council as I believe that I can contribute to moving Taupō District forward. My background in community work as a teacher, police officer, community board and school board of trustees person has given me skills to allow me to do this.
